text: The Anniversary is a 1968 British black comedy movie directed by Roy Ward Baker and based on the play of the same name by Bill MacIlwraith. It stars Bette Davis, James Cossins, Jack Hedley, Sheila Hancock, Christian Roberts and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:1960s black comedy movies Category:1968 LGBT movies Category:British black comedy movies Category:British plays adapted into movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Ward Baker Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in England Category:Movies about dysfunctional families
title: The Anniversary (movie)
